casebody.data:
Third Department,

May, 1938.

(May 4, 1938.) The People of the State of New York, Respondent, v. C. & W. Construction Co., Inc., and Continental Casualty Company, Appellants.

Motion for reargument denied. Motion for leave to appeal to the Court of Appeals denied. Present —■ Hill, P. J., Rhodes, Crapser, Bliss and Heffernan, JJ.
